entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Grande Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:19 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 7:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: WSW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 in a few localities early this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming light late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
